EmailTemplate.description: Sends email on owner update on feedback to record to new assigned owner
EmailTemplate.name: Feedback: Send Email Notification On Change Of Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Knowledge Feedback Assignment Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Feedback__c.OwnerFullName},
The assignment of feedback record, {!Feedback__c.Link}, has been changed to you to resolve. Click on the link to navigate to the feedback to review.
Sincerely,
DCP Knowledge
